mapper.insert: insert into exchangerecord ( RetailerID,GoodsID, Amount,SubmitTime,SendOutTime, CompleteTime,Status,ExchangePoints ) values ( #{RetailerID},#{GoodsID}, #{Amount},#{SubmitTime},#{SendOutTime}, #{CompleteTime},#{Status},#{ExchangePoints} )
mapper.select: select ID,RetailerID,GoodsID, Amount,SubmitTime,SendOutTime, CompleteTime,Status,ExchangePoints from exchangerecord
select ID,RetailerID,GoodsID, Amount,SubmitTime,SendOutTime, CompleteTime,Status,ExchangePoints from exchangerecord where ID = #{ID}
